cab.content: Operations.From; General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To: C. I. G. S., War Office.Despatched 2,10 p.m. 4.11.17. Received 3.17 p,m. 4.11.17.562 cipher November 4th.Situation morning November 4th. No report of enemy pressure on front 3rd and 2nd Armies, and retirement is proceeding. In Val Daone (Giudicaria) enemy attacked Italian line of outposts, but was driven back. On the Stelvio Pass there are 1-1 metres of snow and on the Tonale Pass 70 centimetres of snow.
